name: ghost-inspector-vsts-extension
description: Execute your Ghost Inspector test suites in your Azure DevOps build.
helpMarkDown: Execute your Ghost Inspector test suites in your Azure DevOps build.
author: Ghost Inspector

inputs.name: suiteid
inputs.label: Suite ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of your Ghost Inspector Suite to execute.

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your Ghost Inspector API key, [available in your account](https://app.ghostinspector.com/account).

inputs.name: starturl
inputs.label: Start URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternative start URL for your test suite ([documentation](https://ghostinspector.com/docs/reusing-tests-different-environments/#overriding)).

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Additional Parameters (JSON)
inputs.helpMarkDown: [Additional parameters](https://ghostinspector.com/docs/api/suites/#execute) or [custom variables](https://ghostinspector.com/docs/variables/) in JSON format to POST to the API).

inputs.name: resultspath
inputs.label: Results Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output path for test reports (xUnit v2 format). A report will be saved for each suite that is executed.
